US Release Date: November 14, 2025
Starring: Glen Powell, Colman Domingo, Josh Brolin
Director: Edgar Wright
Synopsis: How much are you willing to sacrifice? #TheRunningMan is playing at #DolbyCinema today.

In a near-future society, The Running Man is the top-rated show on television—a deadly competition where contestants, known as Runners, must survive 30 days while being hunted by professional assassins, with every move broadcast to a bloodthirsty public and each day bringing a greater cash reward.
